body: Oh the woe of being a vanilla and 02 fan at once, so many weird and fetishistic doujins, then I finally find a good one. It's adorably drawn, very wholesome, great concept, adorable femboy, great girl....and it's only 4 pages long :(
F for Goro (again)
4/10 could have gone somewhere
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
F in the chat for goro
Nice Comic Bro ! Keep Up👍

the bro code article 4 paragraph 43 C : thou shall fuckn’t in a fellow brother’s bed, pillow, blanket, or mattress; the violation of this code will have the perpetrator vulnerable to big mcthankies from mcspankies

Cute art work
-need more
I like how goro is always a victim in their shenanigans. 😂
@Not someone to trust what is that doujin are you talking about? may i know the complete title on it so that i can take a look on it too?
thanks for your hard work @lonelyhikimori you are one of the translator that care much of the audience (probably other translators are doing it but ehh i don't see them up until now) cheers!
@Heavenlysubaru Mine is @lnlyhikikomori ^^

Thank you very much for the feedback! English is not my native language and in Japanese word order is really different so maybe that’s why I made those mistakes! I’ll try to correct them in the future ^^

@lonelyhikkikomori
The only noticeable wording/grammar errors are on page four where Hiro says "Seems like she doesn't wear anything down so it seems cold" and where 02 says "I wanted to turn the skirt." Instead of down Hiro should probably be saying something like 'on bottom' or 'underneath', and it would probably flow a bit better to have an 'it' before 'seems'. As for 02's line 'flip' would fit better than 'turn'. Besides that some of the lines lack periods where they should have them at the end but it's not a huge deal. Keep up the good work.
@lonelyhikikomori ,Also my Twitter is @BrokerShame

@lonelyhikikomori ,I think It's true since you in my eyes,are sooo great!
Like i'm puzzled at the fact that you care and do this amazing work,Woww,Like I'm so honored to talk to you!!
@Heavenlysubaru That's not true at all :( I'm not good. But I can send you an autograph if you want on Twitter or somewhere w
<33333,@lonelyhikikomori ,Best Translater Ever tbh,I'd Love an autograph someday X3.

@Heavenlysubaru
I definitely had lots of fun with hrd's works. They are super cute ^^
@lonelyhikikomori ,What was your favorite thing to translate,Also You're super amazing,May the Divines bless you and bring Godly Fortune. :3

@Not someone to trust
1) I think all translators should communicate for with the people who read/watch them!
2) I'm sorry, but to be honest this is the maximum I like. Anything more hard-core is too much for me :(
On a bright note, I translated and uploaded the remaining comics from hrd! (It got the mark Non-H so  I don't think nhentai will upload it, but it's up on e-hentai!)
1. Wtf, a translator that cares for nhentai O.o 2. Plz translate that TSF no F doujin where the guy reincarnates as the daughter of his woman who NTR'ed him
Thx translaters
Goro best boi
Being Goro is suffering.

And it's finally up! I really hope you will like this doujinshi too! Feedback is always appreciated! Neither English nor Japanese is my first language so if you find any mistakes, let me now! - The Translator
Lol.wtf, i just chuckled
Goro would probably have been more of a bro than that X)
